Package org.apache.http.util

Resizable byte and char arrays and various utility classes with static helper methods.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Args  
    Asserts  
    ByteArrayBuffer
    A resizable byte array.
    CharArrayBuffer
    A resizable char array.
    CharsetUtils  
    EncodingUtils
    The home for utility methods that handle various encoding tasks.
    EntityUtils
    Static helpers for dealing with HttpEntitys.
    ExceptionUtils Deprecated
    (4.2) no longer used
    LangUtils
    A set of utility methods to help produce consistent equals and hashCode methods.
    NetUtils  
    TextUtils  
    VersionInfo
    Provides access to version information for HTTP components.

Resizable byte and char arrays and various utility classes with static helper methods.
